events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has flagged the issue as a refund request due to the customer's mention of wanting their money back.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong item received.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'll help you sort out your refund today.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 457812 and attached is a photo showing the incorrect product that arrived at my address.
Thank you for the information. We will process your full refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label for the wrong item.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate the prepaid label and look forward to the refund.
The refund has been initiated and you will receive confirmation shortly. Please return the incorrect item using the provided label.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since there has been no further response, we are closing your case. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
